ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] smile
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, or when I drove by the cop going 87 the other night and thought to myself damn, I got inside his aggro radius .  I was, unfortunately, correct. Kenross
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, or when I drove by the cop going 87 the other night and thought to myself "damn, I got inside his
aggro radius". I was, unfortunately, correct.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 47 songs, Innoruuk


Harmonie Moonsong wrote:

> From: Harmonie Moonsong <harmoniemoonsong@...>
>
> How many times have you answered the phone with "Hail"
>
> > its been a bear to
> > not use it in any professional emails and documents
> > as i have begun to use
> > the subconsciously when i am thinking at the end of
> > a sentence. that along
> > with abreviations. I once told a client over the
> > phone I was going afk..
> > that was quite odd.
> > At any rate enough of the random ramblings of a
> > bard.
> >
> >
> > Mythlon Bladesinger
> > Veeshan Dimension
> >
> >
> I really appreciated this post. I dont know how many
> times in emails at work ive been tempted to use the
> bad typing habits ive picked up in eq and then i have
> to go back and re-write what ive written with proper
> punctuation, capitalization, remove abbreviations and
> (non industry standard) TLA's (thats Three Letter
> Acronyms, for those of you not at Intel(tm) with a TLA
> dictionary on your desk).
>
> Harmonie
